name: Mithril Crossbow
description: A mechanical crossbow forged in mithril, it fires with decent power and speed.

name: Mithril Pickaxe
description: The ideal tool for busting down stone and ore. Also useful for picking up decorations.

name: Enhanced Adamant Pickaxe
description: A pickaxe, enhanced with concrete and dark magic to empower mining within the Withergate mines.

name: Mithril Hoe
description: Tills the land, turning grass into farmable soil.

name: Mithril Axe
description: This will make short work of trees and stumps.

name: Enhanced Adamant Axe
description: An axe, enhanced with concrete and dark magic to empower woodcutting within Withergate forests.

name: Nel'Vari Fishing Rod
description: Masterfully crafted of fine wood, the Elves really know how to make a fishing rod. Increases Fishing skill by 12, increases spawn rate of fish in Nel'Vari by 15% and reduces slider speed during the minigame by 15%.

name: Withergate Fishing Rod
description: Dramatically fancy for a mere fishing rod, Demon fishermen would never be caught using anything less. Increases Fishing skill by 12, increases spawn rate of fish in Withergate by 15% and reduces slider speed during the minigame by 15%.

name: Mithril Watering Can
description: Holds plenty of water for your thirsty crops.

name: Mithril Sword
description: A well-honed blade, friend to every warrior.

name: Mithril Helmet
description: A mind is a terrible thing to waste, so keep yours protected with this metal helmet.

name: Mithril Chest Plate
description: Super heavy, but is great protection.

name: Mithril Legs
description: They clank whenever you walk, but they'll keep your legs shielded.

name: Mithril Gloves
description: Keeps your fingers safe!

name: Moonlight Cape
description: A beautiful cape that was ceremoniously spun under the light of a full moon.

name: Sunset Cape
description: Made with all the shifting colors of a glorious sunset.

name: Majestic Cape
description: Trimmed with golden fleece, this is truly the cape of majesties.

name: Adamant Ring
description: A simple looking adamant ring, it has actually been enchanted to impart increased strength to its wearer.

name: Mithril Ring
description: A simple looking mithril ring, it has actually been enchanted to impart increased strength to its wearer.

name: Glow Ring
description: A conjured spark has been carefully set into this ring using magic, making it a handy source of light.

name: Bonding Ring
description: A pretty heart-shaped gem that has been enchanted to increase the wearer's favor among their peers.

name: Engagement Ring
description: The perfect way to propose. Gift this to your true love when the time is right to ask them to marry you.

name: Golden Egg Ring
description: Who needs a golden goose? Enchanted with the mystical might of eggs, this golden ring grants its wearer a chance to conjure their own golden eggs.

name: Amethyst Ring
description: A roughly cut amethyst set in a band of iron, it trades away elegant beauty in exchange for vitality and might.

name: Diamond Ring
description: Throughout all the regions of the land, there's no ring quite as iconic or as classic as a diamond.

name: Lost Mage's Ring
description: A traveling mage must have dropped this enchanted ring. Oh well, finders keepers!

name: Companion Ring (Left)
description: Your best friend can wear the other half! This ring increases HP regeneration by a small amount. This effect grows stronger with each person in your party who also wears this ring.

name: Companion Ring (Right)
description: Your best friend can wear the other half! This ring increases HP regeneration by a small amount. This effect grows stronger with each person in your party who also wears this ring.

name: Stone Ring
description: Someone took a stone, carved a hole in it and called it a ring. At any rate, an enchantment upon it grants great defense. So that's pretty neat.

name: Black Diamond Ring
description: A ring, set with a carved black diamond. An enchantment upon it brings the wearer a chance to find additional black diamonds.

name: Foraging Ring
description: Often worn by Elven rangers on missions in the deep wilds. Its wearer will have luck in foraging.

name: Hardwood Ring
description: A ring carved of polished hardwood, enchanted to grant its wearer great fortune... in hardwood.

name: Lynn's Shield
description: I'm going to live up to what this crest means, I promise.

name: Anne's Pearl Earrings
description: They're beautiful... I deserve to have them.

name: Donovan's Dog Tag
description: From now on, I'm only going to march where I feel like marching... if I feel like marching at all.

name: Vaan's Ruby Ring
description: Wow? Did a Human make this? They really do make the most incredible things! I'll save this, as a gift for someone really special.

name: Xyla's Queen Chess Piece
description: A king might rule, but it takes a queen to get things done.

name: Nathaniel's Helmet
description: I don't know if there's anything in here worth protecting, but you do a good job at it, helmet.

name: Jun's Diary
description: Someday I'm going to give you away to someone who will truly care to read you.

name: Liam's Oven Mitts
description: I lost so much that day... but I didn't lose my sisters. Or you, my trusty oven mitts.

name: Catherine's Charm
description: You're the strongest charm I've ever made... I want you to protect someone special to me.

name: Claude's House Key
description: A spare house key? What am I ever going to do with this?

name: Kitty's Cat Toy
description: Oh little mousey, maybe there's someone out there who will make me as happy as you do, nya!

name: Wornhardt's Stethoscope
description: As sure as my own heart beats, I will always be there for those who need me.

name: Darius's Royal Heirloom
description: I wonder if I will ever meet someone worthy of accepting this... Not likely.

name: Lucia's Fire Orb
description: I will master this power, grandfather. I swear that I will.

name: Iris's Enchanted Totem
description: Woodworking is so much fun... I wonder why I've felt so inspired lately.

name: Warrior's Keepsake
description: A golden keepsake, honoring a warrior well versed in combat.

name: Pirate Hat (Black)
description: Regulation headwear for the shivering of timbers.

name: Pirate Hat (Blue)
description: Regulation headwear for the shivering of timbers.

name: Pirate Hat (Brown)
description: Regulation headwear for the shivering of timbers.

name: Pirate Hat (Green)
description: Regulation headwear for the shivering of timbers.

name: Pirate Hat (Orange)
description: Regulation headwear for the shivering of timbers.

name: Pirate Hat (Pink)
description: Regulation headwear for the shivering of timbers.

name: Pirate Hat (Purple)
description: Regulation headwear for the shivering of timbers.

name: Pirate Hat (Red)
description: Regulation headwear for the shivering of timbers.

name: Pirate Hat (White)
description: Regulation headwear for the shivering of timbers.

name: Pirate Hat (Yellow)
description: Regulation headwear for the shivering of timbers.

name: Gold Chef Hat
description: Awarded only to the most accomplished foodsmiths... watch as lesser chefs tremble in the presence of your golden prowess!

name: Paper Bag Disguise
description: An ingenious disguise engineered by Donovan, this will totally keep Withergate's guards off your back. Maybe.

name: Golden Leaf Crown
description: Elven weavers travel far across the lands to find leaves of gold. Crowns like this one are considered masterworks.
